title: [Large-Scale] Web 2.0 Technology-Enhanced Professional English Collaborative Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary and grammar comprehension
context.additional_context: A collaboration-focused English education course conducted in a smartphone-based blended learning environment for entry-level professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can generate and revise job-related English expressions with 80% or higher accuracy through real-time collaboration with peers using Padlet.
Learners can complete English project deliverables related to their specialized fields (medical/legal/technical) using Web 2.0 tools and exchange feedback with peers.
Learners can improve their English communication skills by 20% by incorporating formative assessment feedback in a digital environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
